source: ## This note book contains data transformations using SQL
This notebook should not be run on its own, rather it is run as part of the Transforms_Connector notebook
#### Load all required dataframes and convert them to temp sql views

%%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import split

%%pyspark

# setup the temp tables we need
sourcep = oea.stage2p
source3p = oea.stage3p

# used for classenrolment view
factsubjectenrolment_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMFactSubjectEnrolment_pseudo", format='delta')
dmactivity_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMActivity_pseudo", format='delta')
dmsubject_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMSubject_pseudo", format='delta')
dmcalendaryear_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMCalendarYear_pseudo", format='delta')

# stage 3
dmyearlevel_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMYearLevel_pseudo", format='delta')
dmcampus_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMCampus_pseudo", format='delta')
dmdate_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMDate_pseudo", format='delta')
dmpersondemographic_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMPersonDemographic_pseudo", format='delta')

# used for active student view
factpersonmilestone_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/student/DMFactPersonMilestone_pseudo", format='delta')
dmrollgroup_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMRollGroup_pseudo", format='delta')

# used for naplan and acer participation view
factstudentenrolmentcounts_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMFactStudentEnrolmentCounts_pseudo", format='delta')
#dmdate_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMDate_pseudo", format='delta')
# stage 3 naplan and acer participation view
factnaplanstudentyearresult_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMFactNaplanStudentYearResult_pseudo", format='delta')
factpatresults_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMFactPATResults_pseudo", format='delta')

# used for manual AE Learning Task
ae_manuallearningtasks_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/_AE_ManualUploadRawFiles/AE_ManualLearningTasks_pseudo", format='delta')

# used for manual AE Semester Report
ae_manualsemesterreports_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/_AE_ManualUploadRawFiles/AE_ManualSemesterReports_pseudo", format='delta')

# used for ODS tables (+ dmcampus_df already added above)
odsactivity_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODS/CompassODSActivity_pseudo", format='delta')
odsactivityenrolment_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODS/CompassODSActivityEnrolment_pseudo", format='delta')
odsactivityinstance_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODSActivityInstance/CompassODSActivityInstance_pseudo", format='delta')
odscompasssubject_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODS/CompassODSCompassSubject_pseudo", format='delta')

odsstaffdemographic_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODS/CompassODSStaffDemographic_pseudo", format='delta')
odsstudentdemographic_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODSStudentDemographic/CompassODSStudentDemographic_pseudo", format='delta')

odsstafforganisationdetails_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODS/CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails_pseudo", format='delta')
odsstudentorganisationdetails_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODS/CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails_pseudo", format='delta')

odsstafforganisationmilestones_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ODS/CompassODSStaffOrganisationMilestones_pseudo", format='delta')

# stage 3 transform on this table
odsstudentorganisationmilestones_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones_pseudo", format='delta')


# create temp sql views
factsubjectenrolment_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_factsubjectenrolment')
dmactivity_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmactivity')
dmsubject_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmsubject')
dmpersondemographic_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmpersondemographic')
dmyearlevel_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmyearlevel')
dmcampus_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmcampus')
dmdate_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmdate')
dmcalendaryear_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmcalendaryear')
factpersonmilestone_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_factpersonmilestone')
dmrollgroup_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmrollgroup')

factstudentenrolmentcounts_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts')
factnaplanstudentyearresult_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_factnaplanstudentyearresult')
factpatresults_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_factpatresults_df')

ae_manuallearningtasks_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_aemanuallearningtasks')
ae_manualsemesterreports_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_aemanualsemesterreports')

odsactivity_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSActivity') 
odsactivityinstance_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSActivityInstance') 
odsactivityenrolment_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment') 
odscompasssubject_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSCompassSubject') 
odsstaffdemographic_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic') 
odsstudentdemographic_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic') 

odsstafforganisationdetails_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails') 
odsstafforganisationmilestones_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationMilestones')

odsstudentorganisationdetails_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails') 
odsstudentorganisationmilestones_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones')
#### Create the SQL temp views from the loaded dataframes

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_classenrolment;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_classenrolment
AS
SELECT cy.Year AS CalendarYear,
    C.SchoolId AS AGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    student.FirstName  AS  StudentFirstName,
    student.LastName AS StudentLastName,
    Student.Ceider,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    s.SubjectShortName AS Subject,
    a.ActivityName AS  ClassName,
    a.ActivityCode AS ClassCode,
    ClassStartDate.date AS ClassStartDate,
    ClassEndDate.date AS ClassEndDate,
    staff.FirstName AS StaffFirstName,
    staff.LastName AS StaffLastName

    FROM vw_factsubjectenrolment f
    JOIN vw_dmactivity a ON f.SKActivity = a.SKActivity
    AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'
    JOIN vw_dmsubject s ON f.SKSubject = s.SKSubject
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic student ON f.SKStudent = student.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic staff ON f.SKStaff = staff.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
    JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassStartDate ON f.SKEnrolmentStartDate = ClassStartDate.SKDate

    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassEndDate ON f.SKEnrolmentEndDate = ClassEndDate.SKDate
    JOIN vw_dmcalendaryear cy ON f.SKYear = cy.SKYear

    AND cy.Year = 2022
    WHERE ClassEndDate.date > current_date() -- spark sql uses current_date() instead of GETDATE()
    AND s.SubjectShortName <> 'Unknown'
    ORDER BY
    AGEID, YearLevel, StudentFirstName, StudentLastName,Ceider

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudenttemp;

-- Temporary table do not save 
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudenttemp
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    c.SchoolId as CampusId,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudent;

-- Removes duplicates from the active student temp table above
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT *
FROM vw_activestudenttemp
WHERE Ceider NOT IN (SELECT Ceider
                    FROM vw_activestudenttemp
                    GROUP BY Ceider
                    HAVING COUNT(Ceider) > 1)

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_activestudentexceptions;

-- Gets only the duplicates from the active student temp table above so it can be used in an exceptions report 
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudentexceptions
AS
SELECT *
FROM vw_activestudenttemp
WHERE Ceider IN (SELECT Ceider
                    FROM vw_activestudenttemp
                    GROUP BY Ceider
                    HAVING COUNT(Ceider) > 1)

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_inactivestudent;

-- MAY NOT REQUIRE THIS ANYMORE
CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_inactivestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson, 
    pd.Disability,
    pd.ATSIId,
    pd.LBOTE,
    d.date AS DateLeft
    
FROM
    vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmdate d ON f.SKMilestoneStartDate = d.SKDate
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup

WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'False'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
    AND Date < current_date()
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID,yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName,pd.LastName

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_naplanparticipation;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_naplanparticipation
as
select 
*
--, round(cast(#naplan_enrolled as float) / cast(#students_enrolled as float), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(naplan_enrolled / students_enrolled , 2) as participation_perc 
from 
(select 
a.skcampus
, a.skyear
, a.skyearlevel
, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
, innerquery.naplan_enrolled from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a
left join vw_dmdate b on a.skdate = b.skdate
left join 
	(select 
		skcampus
		, skyear
		, skyearlevel
		, count(distinct skpersistentstudentid) as naplan_enrolled 
		from vw_factnaplanstudentyearresult
			group by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel) innerquery
on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel
where a.skyearlevel in (11, 2, 12, 3) 
and b.MonthNumberOfYear = 5
group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.naplan_enrolled
) wholequery
--order by skcampus, skyear, skyearlevel

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_acerparticipation;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_acerparticipation
as
select 
*
--, round(cast(count_of_tests as float) / (cast(#students_enrolled as float) * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
, round(count_of_tests /(students_enrolled  * 2), 2) as participation_perc 
from
(
select 
	--*
	a.skcampus
	, a.skyear
	, a.skdate
	, a.skyearlevel
	, sum(studentcount) as students_enrolled
	, innerquery.count_of_tests 
from vw_factstudentenrolmentcounts a

left join 
	(	
		select innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel, sum(acer_tests) as count_of_tests from 
			(
				select 
						skcampus
						, skyear
						, SKDate
						, skyearlevel
						, SKACERStudent
						, count(distinct skpattest) as acer_tests
						from vw_factpatresults_df
							group by skcampus, skyear, skdate, skyearlevel, SKACERStudent --9
			) innerinner
	group by innerinner.skcampus, innerinner.skyear, innerinner.skdate, innerinner.SKYearLevel
	) innerquery

on a.skcampus = innerquery.skcampus and a.skyear = innerquery.skyear and a.skdate = innerquery.skdate and a.skyearlevel = innerquery.skyearlevel 
where a.skyearlevel in (21, 11, 10, 2, 16, 12, 20, 3, 17) --ACER - year levels 2 to 10
group by a.skcampus, a.skyear, a.skdate, a.skyearlevel, innerquery.count_of_tests
) wholequery

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ae_manual_learningtasks;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_learningtasks
as

select 
m.School_Name
,m.Area
,m.Semester
,m.Year
,m.SubjectName
,m.Code
,m.TeacherImportIdentifier
,m.TaskId
,m.IsSubjectWide
,m.TaskName
,m.StudentCode
,m.GovtCode1
,m.StudentLastName
,m.StudentFirstName
,m.YearLevel
--,case when m.YearLevel is null then m.YearLevel else concat('Year ' , cast(m.YearLevel as string)) end
,m.ResultType
,m.PrimaryGrade
,m.CommentTimestamp
,m.CommentPosterCode
,m.CommentPosterName
,m.Result
,m.ComponentName
,m.ComponentType
,m.IsIncludedInReport
,m.ReportCycleName
,m.DueDate
,m.Category
,m.SubmissionStatus
,m.ReceiptTime
,m.BKID
,innerquery.ceider
,innerquery.schoolid
,innerquery.skcampus
from vw_aemanuallearningtasks m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype, b.skcampus, b.skyearlevel,  c.schoolname, c.area, c.schoolid, d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
        and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = lower(innerquery.firstname)
and lower(m.studentlastname) = lower(innerquery.lastname)
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
--and trim(m.yearlevel) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and trim(case when m.YearLevel is null then -1 else m.YearLevel end) = trim(innerquery.yearlevelsifcode)
and lower(m.area) = lower(innerquery.area)

where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ae_manual_semesterreports;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_semesterreports
as

select 
m.* 
, innerquery.ceider
, innerquery.schoolid
, innerquery.skcampus
from vw_aemanualsemesterreports m

left join 
(
    select a.ceider, a.firstname, a.lastname, a.persontype
    ,b.skcampus
    ,c.schoolname, c.area, c.schoolid
    ,b.skyearlevel 
    ,d.yearlevelsifdesc, d.businessdesc, d.yearlevelsifcode
    --, concat(lower(a.firstname), lower(a.lastname), lower(c.schoolname), lower(d.businessdesc)) as joinkey
    from vw_dmpersondemographic a 
    left join vw_factpersonmilestone b on a.ceider = b.ceider
    left join vw_dmcampus c on b.skcampus = c.skcampus
    left join vw_dmyearlevel d on b.skyearlevel = d.skyearlevel
    where a.persontype = 'Student'
         and b.iscurrentmilestone = 'True'
) innerquery

on lower(m.studentfirstname) = trim(lower(innerquery.firstname))
and lower(m.studentlastname) = trim(lower(innerquery.lastname))
and lower(m.school_name) = lower(innerquery.schoolname)
and lower(m.area) = lower(innerquery.area)
and trim(lower(m.studentyearlevel)) = trim(lower(innerquery.yearlevelsifdesc))


where m.result in ('A', 'A+', 'A-', 'B', 'B+', 'B-', 'C', 'C+', 'C-', 'D', 'D+', 'D-', 'E', 'E+', 'N')

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_studentclass;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_studentclass
as

SELECT distinct
d.FirstName AS StudentFirstName 
,d.LastName AS StudentLastName
,d.CompassPersonId
,d.GovCode1 AS Ceider
,s.SubjectLongName
,a.SubjectCode
,a.ActivityName
,a.ActivityTypeDescription
,a.ManagingCompassPersonId
,staff.firstname
,staff.lastname
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentStartDate
,ae.ActivityEnrolmentEndDate
,concat(staff.FirstName,' ',staff.LastName) AS StaffName
,a.CampusId AS AGEID
,c.CampusSuburbAndName
--,c.CompassSchoolURL
,s.AcademicYear
,ae.iscurrent as IsCurrent_ActivityEnrolment
,a.IsCurrent as IsCurrent_Activity
,s.IsCurrent as IsCurrent_Subject
,staff.iscurrent as IsCurrent_Staff
,d.iscurrent as IsCurrent_Student


FROM 
vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic d 

JOIN vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment ae 
ON d.CompassPersonId = ae.CompassPersonId

JOIN vw_CompassODSActivity a 
ON ae.ActivityCode = a.ActivityCode
AND ae.CampusId = a.CampusId

LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_CompassODSCompassSubject s 
ON ae.SubjectCode = s.SubjectImportIdentifier
AND a.CampusId = s.CampusId

LEFT outer JOIN vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic  staff 
ON staff.CompassPersonId = a.ManagingCompassPersonId 

JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON a.CampusId = c.bkCampusId
WHERE 
d.iscurrent is True
AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_studentstable;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ods_studentstable
as

select
distinct ms.CompassPersonId as MS_CompassPersonID
,demo.CompassPersonId as DEMO_CompassPersonID
,ms.yearlevel
,ms.isactive 
,ms.iscurrentmilestone 
,ms.studenttype 
,ms.dioceseId
,ms.campusid 
,camp.skcampus
,camp.BKCampusId
,camp.SchoolName
,ms.iscurrent
,demo.firstname
,demo.lastname 
--,demo.gender 
,demo.govcode1 as ceider
--,demo.disability 
--,demo.LBOTE 
--,demo.indigenoustypecode 
,ms.milestonetimestamp
,year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) AS calendaryear
from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones ms

left join vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic demo on ms.CompassPersonId = demo.CompassPersonId 
	and demo.Iscurrent = 'True'

left join vw_dmcampus camp on ms.campusid = camp.BKCampusId

where 
ms.iscurrent = 'True'
and ms.isactive = 'True'
--and ms.iscurrentmilestone  = 'True' --this is just for 2023 (current year)
and year(MilestoneTimestamp + INTERVAL 10 HOURS) in (2021, 2022, 2023)

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ae_manual_combined;

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_ae_manual_combined
as

select 
concat('LT',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as id
, School_Name
, Area
, Semester
, Year
, trim(substring(subjectname, 3)) as SubjectName 
, code as ClassCode
, StudentCode
, GovtCode1
, StudentFirstName
, initcap(studentlastname) as StudentLastName
, CASE
    WHEN yearlevel is not null THEN concat('Year ', yearlevel)
    ELSE yearlevel
        END as YearLevel
, ResultType
, CASE
    WHEN result = 'A+' THEN 'A'
    WHEN result = 'A-' THEN 'A'
    WHEN result = 'B+' THEN 'B'
    WHEN result = 'B-' THEN 'B'
    WHEN result = 'C+' THEN 'C'
    WHEN result = 'C-' THEN 'C'
    WHEN result = 'D+' THEN 'D'
    WHEN result = 'D-' THEN 'D'
    WHEN result = 'E+' THEN 'E'
    ELSE result
        END as Result
, BKID
, ceider 
, schoolid
, skcampus

from vw_ae_manual_learningtasks 

union 

select 
concat('SR',row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ceider)) as id
, School_Name
, Area
, Semester
, Year
, subject as SubjectName 
, ClassCode
, StudentCode
, GovtCode1
, StudentFirstName
, StudentLastName
, StudentYearLevel
, AssessmentType as ResultType
, Result
, BKID
, ceider 
, schoolid
, skcampus

from vw_ae_manual_semesterreports

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents;

create temp view vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents
as

select distinct 

	year(current_date) as Year
	, replace(YearLevel, '0', 'P') as YearLevel
	, instance.CampusId as CampusID
	, campus.SchoolNameAndArea
	, ManagingCompassPersonId as TeacherID
	, concat(staffdemo.TeacherFirstName, ' ', staffdemo.TeacherLastName) as TeacherName
	, students.StudentCompassPersonId as StudentID
	, concat(studentdemo.FirstName, ' ', studentdemo.LastName) as StudentName
	, enrolment.ActivityName as ClassName
	, enrolment.ActivityCode as ClassID
	, trim(coalesce(staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, staffdemo.TeacherEmailAddress)) as StaffEmail
	, trim(studentemail.OrganisationUserEmail) as StudentEmail
	, trim(studentdemo.GovCode1) as Ceider


from

-- Student Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, YearLevel, split(OrganisationName, '-')[0] as OrganisationName, CampusId
  from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationMilestones
  where 1=1
  and IsActive = 'True'
  and IsCurrent = 'True'
  and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
  and DioceseId = 12
  and (YearLevel = '0' or YearLevel = '1' or YearLevel = '2')
) students

left join

-- Compass Activity Enrolment
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, ActivityCode, ActivityName, CampusID
	from vw_CompassODSActivityEnrolment
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
	and RoleDescription = 'Student'
	and ActivityName <> 'Sickbay'
	and SubjectCode IS NOT NULL
	and year(ActivityEnrolmentStartDate) = year(current_date)
	and (ActivityCode like 'GEN%' or ActivityCode like 'PREP%')
) enrolment

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = enrolment.StudentCompassPersonId

left join

-- Compass Activity Instance
(select distinct ActivityCode, ManagingCompassPersonId, CampusId
  from vw_CompassODSActivityInstance
  where 1=1 
  and IsCurrent = 'True'
  and DioceseId = 12
  and (ActivityCode like 'GEN%' or ActivityCode like 'PREP%')
  and year(Start) = year(current_date)
  and ManagingCompassPersonId <> '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'
) instance 

on enrolment.ActivityCode = instance.ActivityCode
and enrolment.CampusID = instance.CampusId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Milestones
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationMilestones
	where 1=1
	and DioceseId = 12
	and IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and IsActive = 'True'
) staffmilestone

on instance.ManagingCompassPersonId = staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Demographic
-- only getting the personal email here because some schools have accidentally 
-- put the org user email in this field in compass
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StaffCompassPersonId, FirstName as TeacherFirstName, LastName as TeacherLastName, EmailAddress as TeacherEmailAddress
	from vw_CompassODSStaffDemographic
	where 1=1
	and IsCurrent = 'True'
) staffdemo

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffdemo.StaffCompassPersonId

inner join

-- Staff Organisation Details (email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as TeacherCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail as TeacherOrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStaffOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail NOT LIKE '%supply%'
) staffemail

on staffmilestone.StaffCompassPersonId = staffemail.TeacherCompassPersonId
and staffmilestone.OrganisationName = staffemail.OrganisationName

-- compare the subdomain values from the OrganisationName and Teacher email 
and staffemail.TeacherOrganisationUserEmail like concat('%', students.OrganisationName, '%')

inner join -- inner join will remove students without demographic information

-- Student Demographic
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, FirstName, LastName, GovCode1
	from vw_CompassODSStudentDemographic
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
) studentdemo

on students.StudentCompassPersonId = studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId

inner join  -- inner join will remove students without email

-- Student Organisation Details (Email)
(select distinct CompassPersonId as StudentCompassPersonId, OrganisationUserEmail, OrganisationName
	from vw_CompassODSStudentOrganisationDetails
	where 1=1
	and Iscurrent = 'True'
	and OrganisationUserEmail IS NOT NULL --these are all duplicate students that have emails in other records
) studentemail

on studentdemo.StudentCompassPersonId = studentemail.StudentCompassPersonId
and students.OrganisationName = studentemail.OrganisationName

left join

-- Get the School Names
(select SchoolId, SchoolNameAndArea
	from vw_dmcampus
) campus

on campus.SchoolId = instance.CampusId

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_addedstaff;

#### Save the SQL Temp views created above

%%pyspark

# now save the sql views created above
classenrolment_df = spark.read.table('vw_classenrolment')
activestudent_df = spark.read.table('vw_activestudent')
activestudentexceptions_df = spark.read.table('vw_activestudentexceptions')
#inactivestudent_df = spark.read.table('vw_inactivestudent')

naplanparticipation_df = spark.read.table('vw_naplanparticipation')
acerparticipation_df = spark.read.table('vw_acerparticipation')

ae_manual_learningtasks_df = spark.read.table('vw_ae_manual_learningtasks')
ae_manual_semesterreports_df = spark.read.table('vw_ae_manual_semesterreports')

ods_studentclass_df = spark.read.table('vw_ods_studentclass')
ods_earlyyearsstudents_df = spark.read.table('vw_ods_earlyyearsstudents_addedstaff')
ods_studentstable_df = spark.read.table('vw_ods_studentstable')

ae_manual_combined_df = spark.read.table('vw_ae_manual_combined')


saveToTarget(classenrolment_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_DMClassEnrolment')
saveToTarget(activestudent_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTActiveStudent')
saveToTarget(activestudentexceptions_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTActiveStudentExceptions')

#saveToTarget(inactivestudent_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTInactiveStudent')

saveToTarget(naplanparticipation_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTNaplanParticipation')
saveToTarget(acerparticipation_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTAcerParticipation')

saveToTarget(ae_manual_learningtasks_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTAELearningTasks')
saveToTarget(ae_manual_semesterreports_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTAESemesterReports')

saveToTarget(ods_studentclass_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTODSStudentClass')
saveToTarget(ods_earlyyearsstudents_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTODSEarlyYearsStudents')
saveToTarget(ods_studentstable_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTODSStudentsTable')

saveToTarget(ae_manual_combined_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTAECombined')
